title: Gift Card
description:
Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a Horizon Supply Co Gift Card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.
content:
Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a Horizon Supply Co Gift Card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

title: DiE4u Longsleeve
description:
You know that I’d die for, I cry for
You know that I’d die for you 
You know that I breathe for, I bleed for
You know that I breathe for you

title: SURVIVAL HORROR Hoodie - Black
description:
A classic black pullover hoodie featuring a large Hex front print and the back is home to a printed patch of the artwork from Bring Me The Horizon's new EP, POST HUMAN: SURVIVAL HORROR. The patch has raw hems designed to fray over time. 

Wash at 30 with like colours. Do not tumble dry. Iron on reverse.
content:
A classic black pullover hoodie featuring a large Hex front print and the back is home to a printed patch of the artwork from Bring Me The Horizon's new EP, POST HUMAN: SURVIVAL HORROR. The patch has raw hems designed to fray over time. 

Wash at 30 with like colours. Do not tumble dry. Iron on reverse.

title: Living to Die Longsleeve
description:
A black longsleeve, featuring lyrics and shots from Bring Me The Horizon's music video for 'sTraNgeRs' in neon green, glow in the dark ink.

 In order for the phosphors to re-emit light, they must absorb light; however, there are certain wavelengths of light that are better absorbed than others. Light that emits ultra violet radiation charges quickly and works best.

100% Organic Cotton. 
This product was manufactured solely using renewable energy from wind and solar power.
content:
A black longsleeve, featuring lyrics and shots from Bring Me The Horizon's music video for 'sTraNgeRs' in neon green, glow in the dark ink.

 In order for the phosphors to re-emit light, they must absorb light; however, there are certain wavelengths of light that are better absorbed than others. Light that emits ultra violet radiation charges quickly and works best.

100% Organic Cotton. 
This product was manufactured solely using renewable energy from wind and solar power.

title: E.V.E. Baby T-Shirt
description:
A ribbed white baby T-Shirt featuring a raised chrome Hex print on the front and E.V.E printed on the back.

This garment does have stretch, so if you want a tighter fit we recommend sizing down.
95% organic cotton 5% elastane.

Wash at a low temperature. Do not tumble dry. If you need to iron make sure you turn garment inside out and avoid the embellished area.
content:
A ribbed white baby T-Shirt featuring a raised chrome Hex print on the front and E.V.E printed on the back.

This garment does have stretch, so if you want a tighter fit we recommend sizing down.
95% organic cotton 5% elastane.

Wash at a low temperature. Do not tumble dry. If you need to iron make sure you turn garment inside out and avoid the embellished area.

title: Heart Stops Beating T-Shirt (White)
description:
Three in the morning, I ain’t slept all weekend
Six feet in the dirt, still breathing
Don’t give a fuck if my heart stops beating

An oversized, white T-Shirt inspired by the Bring Me The Horizon single 'DArkSide'.

The front features single artwork, with the back reading Don't Give A Fuck If My Heart Stops Beating along with the band's name.

Wash at 30 degrees. Do not tumble dry. Iron low on reverse.

This isn’t love, this is a car crash

A classic fit, black hoodie with artwork inspired by the Bring Me The Horizon single DiE4u. The hoodie features BMTH on the chest, blood splatter print on the sleeve and a large vampire print on the back with glow in the dark eyes and fangs.

100% cotton.

Wash with like colours at 30 degrees. Do not tumble dry. Iron low on reverse.

title: E.V.E Cotton Shirt
description:
Limited edition /300 cotton shirt with all over POST HUMAN: NeX GEn print including E.V.E on the back.

Digital rendering - final item may differ slightly

Wash at 30 with like colours. Do not tumble dry. Iron low on reverse.

title: Sempiternal Coin Necklace
description:
Necklace with engraved Sempiternal medallion pendant (1"). The front features the Sempiternal emblem with the reverse engraved with '10 Years of Sempiternal'. 

24" adjustable chain.

Comes in a black velvet pouch.

Available in black chrome, gold and silver.

This is costume jewellery, so please avoid direct contact with perfumes, hairspray and water.
Nickel and gilt coated iron.

This item was created to celebrate the 10th Anniversary of Sempiternal.
